website_summaries.verdict: Versatile design that's suitable for many water sport equipment needs.
pros: Plenty of room for fins, snorkel, and more, and comes with a useful bungee cord on the exterior that can accommodate rolled-up towels or flip flops
The padded exterior pocket offers extra protection for masks
Comes with a comfortable padded adjustable shoulder strap
cons: 1 long zipper goes around the bag, which is prone to snagging

customer_reviews.title: Well worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: well, if you are interested in one of these, you probably snorkel or scuba. I took this bag with me to my last visit to Cozumel and it is an awesome bag to tote your fins, snorkel mask and necessities for a day on the beach. This bag fit my gear, and the zippered pocket fit my phone, smokes, camera, and sunglasses. Plus, the bungee cord on the front can secure your flip flops or a wet towel if you don't want to get your electronics wet. I am very pleased with this purchase and recommend it if you're looking for a light, durable gear bag.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Second one ordered not the same size.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one liked it so much so I ordered another. The second one I received is much smaller and is not useful at all. I ordered these within a day or so apart. The second one I got is about 1 1/2" narrower at the top and will not zip with fins in it. The overall length is about the same but the depth is about 1" less than the first one ordered. I will have to return these and find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Misc12900

customer_reviews.title: 24" fins fit
customer_reviews.text: Its great! Very sturdy and I can fit my atomic split fins in it no problem( 24") however i dont see fins much larger fitting. I can get my boots, gloves and mask (in it's case) to fit using both pockets and my great packing skills! It is a tight fit for all of this so if you have anything more than me I would consider different options. I do still have room for a snorkel but thats about it. Either way it's perfect for me! and i Love it!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Snorkel gear
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well, fits two pairs of fins and two full full face snorkel masks. Fits into luggage or take as a carry on when flying. Easy to carry to snorkeling spot when walking. Used it on two vacations, boat excursions and it is holding up wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: water lover

customer_reviews.title: Great bag exactly what i needed
customer_reviews.text: Great bag exactly what i needed. I have large scuba fins that i use when i snorkel, and it fit them perfectly. Not only this, but in the front it has a pocket large enough to hold my goggles (in there hard plastic container)and even my snorkel. The same pocket could potentially fit any small items like keys, lip balm, etc. It feels sturdy, and has a cushioned one strap in the back. I will be vacationing this winter and will update how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: kait

customer_reviews.title: Great capacity
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I give this a 4 star review, is that I would have liked a second sholder strap at times when you are carrying a lot, and it slides off the one shoulder. Most of the time one is sufficient, but I guess I am just a two-shouldered backpack geek. Other than that, it is perfect. I love the capacity. We fit two full sets of gear (Fins, masks, and snorkels) without mashing anything important. That even left a little room for something to go in the outer pocket, but we didn't need that much. The quality is great. It is sturdy, and still has good drying ability when putting things away wet.
customer_reviews.author: AbqPhil

customer_reviews.title: Held 2 sets of gear!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this new bag for our gear when we went on our honeymoon in Puerto Rico, needing to downsize to only one gear bag, as we did all carry-on luggage. It held 2 sets of TREK fins (the shorter travel model from US Divers), 2 masks 2/ snorkels, 2 vests for long trips (the scubapro type), anti-fog drops, sunscreen, and 2 underwater point-and-shoot cameras. Can't have asked for more. Granted, it was a tight fit, but we did it. Probably wouldn't have worked if my women's-sized fins were any bigger. But, it would definitely hold one person's gear with plenty of room to spare!
customer_reviews.author: LNS

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this bag as it was too small for anything. Could not even fit my Mares fins into the bag, was able to get them in but could not close the bag. Nothing else will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small for anything but fins.  No dry compartment either.
customer_reviews.text: Fits adult l/xl fins but nothing else except a snorkel and squished mask. Get a bigger bag or you'll end up with two bags to carry on your shoulder instead of one larger bag. Nice quality but too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag, Well Constructed, But...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bag that is durable and handy to use. However, I wouldn't use it for anything more than snorkeling. You should also be very careful to make sure your fins will fit. As a scuba diver, I don't get as much use out of this bag as I had hoped. However, we do snorkel occasionally and it works great. There is padding along the strap to make it more comfortable and the elastic on the front has come in handy as well.
customer_reviews.author: KDive

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this.
customer_reviews.text: Glad I got this. It held two sets of fins and one mask. It might have held two masks but one is a full face and is large and bulky. The full face mask might have fit with only one set of fins. I like the cross strap and top handle. It fit nicely in the airplane overhead and was easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Sameh

customer_reviews.title: Old stock?
customer_reviews.text: The elastic straps on the rear of the bag were completely rotten and entirely unusable. I would have kept it had the been useable. My snorkeling equipment fit nicely and I was disappointed that I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Bought recently to take on a cruise that I planned to do some snorkeling. Perfect for my needs. Held a full set of TUSA Imprex fins, mask, snorkel, passport case, camera and a large beach towel in the bungee straps. All this and I still had a little room left over. Seems well constructed and durable. For short day snorkel trips, I highly Recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: rhoadsy

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT HOLD TWO SETS OF EQUIPMENT
customer_reviews.text: This is a well constructed bag with plenty of room for one set of equipment. I purchased this item based on the reviews of others and share most of their positive comments however THIS BAG DOES NOT HOLD TWO SETS OF EQUIPMENT like some reviewers have stated! I had great difficulty getting two sets of fins in the bag - nothing more would fit.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Fits two sets of snorkel gear and then some
customer_reviews.text: Review from my wife: Love this bag. I put both me and my husband's snorkelegear in it with room to spare. Fits everything including two small towels and still has room left for some small items. Seems to be very good quality and has nice padded shoulder strap. Can't wait to take on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: C and L

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for Snorkel Gear
customer_reviews.text: I used this recently on a trip to Mexico. Carried all day at Xcaret in Mexico and out on a snorkel trip to the reef. Stored 29 inch fins, snorkel mask in its own bag inside this one. Also carried rash guard shirt on bungees on the outside, and still had room for other stuff. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Arrow Flight

customer_reviews.title: carrys long fins and a lot more
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to carry as a shoulder bag. Will fit 2 sets of fins. 1 set of goggles for sure and you could strap on another pair on the outside. We had 28" fins, 22" fins, gloves, booties, and mask all on the inside. strapped a 2nd mask onto the outside and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Zephyr ridge

customer_reviews.title: good travel pack for fins
customer_reviews.text: I got this to schlep my wife and my fins to Hawaii, I hate the rental fins. It's big enough to hold 2 pairs of snorkeling fins and 2 snorkels, but not the masks. I could also cram in a couple pairs of board shorts and a rashie. My only complaint is the pocket on the back is too thin to hold much.
customer_reviews.author: whistler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Fits my 30" fins, mask, snorkle, booties, and my 3mm shorty wetsuit with a little stuffing. I love this bag! Great durability and easy to travel with and you can't beat the price ($19.99) for this quality!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Hold two full sets and vests
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I put both sets of fins, mask, vests, and anti-fog in this bag. We stuck a towel in the webbing. It has a side zipper area also which was good for keys and other items. Good size, strap was comfortable. Convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item to carry 2 sets of mid-size fins and 2 masks. It has room for both. We cruise to different ports and in almost each port we snorkel. It is perfect for carrying these items, not too heavy for packing, and has a comfortable strap for carrying. It appears to be well made and only time will tell. The shipment was to our house in 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to pack snorkeling gear and protect from damage. The quality of the bag is excellent and will handle fins, mask, snorkel and other accessories in a nice compact and convenient carry bag. I really like how you can store all of the diving gear together for road trips and especially for plane travel. The backpack is a great value and I like the ruggedness of the design and overall functionality. The pack has heavy duty zippers and great carry strap and comfortable shoulder strap. Excellent product and highly recommend for your consideration.
customer_reviews.author: Computer Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, held two sets of gear
customer_reviews.text: We got good use out of this nag on our ten day trip to Kauai, we snorkeled several days and used the bag to hold two sets of snorkels, masks, fins, a bottle of anti-fog drops and a few other small items. I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking to carry it on to a plane and it would be perfect & five stars for one set of gear.
customer_reviews.author: BossyLadySunday

customer_reviews.title: Fits my stuff & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I snorkel quite a bit and this is super handy! Keeps all my gear in one place and the bag is comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: PilotBob

customer_reviews.title: Fits big fins!
customer_reviews.text: Fits big fins and a full face mask. Very well made. Padded shoulder strap too!
customer_reviews.author: Richard G.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great, large
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, large, gear bag. It will easily accommodate large (long) diving fins - or use it for 2 sets of small (child's) equipment. The 1 negative is the shoulder strap being sewn in the middle of the bag, both top & bottom; this doesn't allow the bag to hang in the middle of your back.
customer_reviews.author: CalifRef

customer_reviews.title: Read the fine print.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in thought I would need for the new gear I bought. Only holds flippers, Mask if you want to squeeze in.. But never used it, so just hanging around.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Berry

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BAGS!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my hubby and me to take on a cruise. They are well made and a great size to fit everything in that we need. Sling it over your back and you are hands-free for everything else you need! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Islandgirl19

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for your snorkel on a day at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for your snorkel on a day at the beach or your dive gear if you are renting BCD. Roomy. Can usually fit 2 sets of fins and masks per bag.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for weekend snorkeling.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my husband and myself, and I am really impressed with the quality. The bag was able to fit long fins, boots, mask and snorkel. The strap on the bag makes the bag easy to carry, especially if you have other gear to carry. The only disadvantage is that the front pouch is fairly flat and doesn't offer a lot of support. I recommend using a case to put your mask in to keep it from getting crushed. Overall, it was perfect for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Micale K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome way to carry your snorkel gear
customer_reviews.text: Awesome way to carry your snorkel gear . The zip portion fits a full face mask . Zipper on pouch is a little funky though
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Promate backpack style suba bag
customer_reviews.text: I can fit everything in it except my mask but that's ok I don't mean
customer_reviews.author: Boss19

customer_reviews.title: Elastic was dry rotted and brittle
customer_reviews.text: I received the bag and all the elastic on the front was so dry rotted and brittle it just cracked inside so it was useless very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: small teeth zippers make this bag a no go for a any salt water excursions, they froze up and had to put WD 40 and then they later broke. Need bigger teeth zippers.
customer_reviews.author: Mort

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bag for Snorkel Gear
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance on this bag and I am glad I did! It was stuffed full and used in Belize and Cozumel. The bag worked perfectly and as descriibed by the Seller. I would purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis McGowen

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for my fins!
customer_reviews.text: I'd definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a bag for their fins. It works great and stores my fins, snorkel, mask, and fin boots. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Traviscf

customer_reviews.title: Won't go snorkeling without it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, holds all my gear. I feel like I know what I'm doing or at least look like I do with this cool sling back pack.
customer_reviews.author: P. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all snorkeling and diving gear. Enough space for extra stuff like towels and clothing.
customer_reviews.author: NEC Services

customer_reviews.title: I can actually take this below
customer_reviews.text: When diving I put my sandals and snorkel gear in here and no trouble toting it underwater. When on shore or in the boat, my clumsy fins and mask fit in there perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: jhauck6671

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great - very thoughtfully designed. I was hoping it would be big enough to hold both my and my husbands snorkling gear and it more than does that. As far as I am concerned this purchase was a "two-for-one" deal in that both our gear fits in the one bag. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Lamb

customer_reviews.title: too small...fins and keys only.
customer_reviews.text: the small pocket is too slim for my mask case AND snorkel to fit comfortably, and no chance at all to squeeze in my booties too.
customer_reviews.author: Zinjanthropus

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag, we brought two but it will fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag , we brought two but it will fit two sets of fins and two snorkels and two masks so we sold the other one to a friend also a great price
customer_reviews.author: Kay Coenen

customer_reviews.title: Promate Dive Bag
customer_reviews.text: fast shipping. it holds most of the dive basics that I need it to (fins, booties, thermal top, dive log) and is incredibly light. easy to carry. cons: the small pocket is not big enough for my mask and snorkel, extra case for that was purchased and easily attached with a clip.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag for snorkeling gear, for excellent price. Fit set of fins, mask and snorkel with no problems, and have room for towel and swim suit, bottle of water, etc.....Well made.
customer_reviews.author: K9 Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great bag - lot's of room inside
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money. The bag has a nice carrying strap and space for all normal snorkeling gear, towel (outside), neoprene shirt, and lunch as well. I am nervous the zippers won't last as long as the rest of the bag, but at the current price, you can't go wrong with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brynaa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and very happy I bought this backpack
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: These bag is great; larger than most
customer_reviews.text: These bag is great; larger than most, Lots of room for towel & shoes. Strap runs straight down bag so you have to work to get it comfortably across your back otherwise no complaints
customer_reviews.author: charlotte coddington

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my scuba fins
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my scuba fins, boots, snorkle, and mask. Mask had to be taken out of the case to fit but it is a great item to take everything to the dive boat when on vacations
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Great snorkel bag but could be a little small for some
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I used this for our first time snorkeling in Maui and it was a pretty decent little bag. We could carry our fins, masks and snorkels, but it did get a little crowded after that. If we end up snorkeling on a regular basis, I might opt for a larger bag or a second one of these, so we could each have our own. One huge improvement would be a dry pocket that you could put a phone, but for a simple snorkel bag, it's pretty good and I felt I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: J E

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad that I bought this.
customer_reviews.text: I use it every week. I put my fins in it, goggles, my towel and everything I need to shower and it looks great. I'm so happy i bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Blackjaguar

customer_reviews.title: Holds all of our snorkel gear. It will not ...
customer_reviews.text: Holds all of our snorkel gear. It will not hold 2 pairs of fins though as someone had previously posted.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping. Great bag! My snorkel gear fit great. Bag is very durable. Not sure if very large dive fins would fit but my shorter fins fit perfect. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: C. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Pretty useful and comfortable. Perfect for my underwater needs :)
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Zapata Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Not big enough.
customer_reviews.text: Not big enough for 2 snorkiel sets. Material not that great.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag with alot of room!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for a four day trip to Oahu. I was able to carry 2 pairs of 22 inch fins plus my mask in the main pouch plus an additional mask and sunscreen in the smaller pouch. The bag is sturdy and I know that I will get several more uses out of it without a problem. I did alot of walking with the bag and the strap was comfortable, even when I was wearing it and carrying a kayak at the same time. This is a good bag for the money!
customer_reviews.author: SoCalJay

customer_reviews.title: Handy Backpack for your snorkeling gear
customer_reviews.text: We bought these after a dive trip to Thailand where we had a large boxy duffel to carry out fins, snorkels, booties, & masks. We bought two separate bags, one for my wife and one for me. these are great to carry your fins, mask, snorkel, booties, a towel and a few other small items (snack, camera, phone, etc) without gear falling all over the place. Easy to get around and in and out of boats with all of it on your back as your hands are free to grab and keep your balance. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Oaks

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat Tight :-/
customer_reviews.text: I can fit my fins along with my mask and snorkel but thats about it.
customer_reviews.author: John Paul Goncalves

customer_reviews.title: What I expected
customer_reviews.text: This pack comfortably fit my snorkel, mask, and fins. It seems to be made well so hopefully will last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Justin D. Turner

customer_reviews.title: snorkle bag
customer_reviews.text: bag holds 2 pairs of fins, 2 snorkles and 2 masks and has extra pocket and straps to hold valuables and towels. It can be slung over one shoulder and carried to the beach. get it ...you will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our trip
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to carry our snorkeling equipment for a recent trip to the USVI. Two sets of fins & all fit - though snuggly. Great to carry.
customer_reviews.author: SBF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to carry on plane!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these bags for my husband and I when we were going on vacation. They are the perfect size to carry on the plane for those that don't want to check their essential scuba gear. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Kellilyn Casey

customer_reviews.title: Good bag. Actually can fit two sets of fins
customer_reviews.text: Good bag. Actually can fit two sets of fins, snorkels, and fins, which makes it a great travelling bag.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my wife who trains apnea. This bag is beautiful, well done and the size is right for the apnea's personal equipment: fins, snorkel, mask, full body suit, towel and a little additional space for anything else. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Amézquita

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Big enough to put all my snorkel gear in there and then some for other things like sunscreen and other things. The strap makes it very comfortable and I like having it in a nice package. Really worth it, also it keeps things organized and in one place when you just need to grab and go.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Towelie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's Perfect I can get fins mask and snorkel and towel with room for more!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The zipper is two small and it also need a double one
customer_reviews.author: erick romero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My promate snorkel set is in it's bag and ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: michael ginn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it appears that this will be able to carry all of my gear.
customer_reviews.author: Jay LaVallie

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift, I was very satisfied with the quality of this product. Well made with plenty of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This bag provided great space for my fins, mask and accessories without added bulk. Easy to get in overhead bin on plane and easy to carry in crowded airport. A great purchase for travelling.
customer_reviews.author: sajones

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag for my scuba stuff
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack for scuba stuff (fins, goggles). There's not enough space to put the booties, but you can stuff it in the mesh in front of the bag. Unlike some reviewers suggested, there is only enough space for 1 pair of fins. You can squeeze in some light stuff like swimming trunks, etc, but you can't put a second pair of fins. I liked it so much that I ordered a second one for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Efby

customer_reviews.title: Fits two sets of full foot fins and 2 snorkels ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits two sets of full foot fins and 2 snorkels. Doesn't fit masks though unless you get the one with the mask compartment. We prefers to keep the masks in their original cases to prevent scratches. Holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: savvyshopper

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice bag - sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice bag - sturdy, but it has no good place to hold your mask. I would recommend the one with the mask holder.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Not So Big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two separate snorkel bags to see which I liked the best. This one is rather small. I planned to give this one to my daughter, but the zippers don't feel like they would stand up to opening / closing for more than a couple of weeks. Enough room for fins in the main pouch, but only enough room for a 1/4 pamphlet in the outside pocket. I'm sending this one back. My kid's gear won't even fit. This is more of a fin bag than anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

product_meta.title: Promate Snorkeling Scuba Diving Mask Fin Snorkel Backpack Gear Bag
product_meta.description: This practical, convenient and affordable backpack-style bag for Snorkeling Gear is perfect for vacation or carrying your snorkel gear to your local snorkeling spots. This bag features: Specifically designed to hold mask, fins and snorkel Padded exterior pocket for mask and snorkel protection Overall size: 30" (H) x 11.5" (W) x 7.5" (D) High Quality Materials And Construction Heavy PVC coated Mesh Panels For Drainage and Fast Drying Nylon Top Carry Handle Heavy Duty Zippers Water Resistant Nylon Back Single Padded Adjustable Shoulder Strap Front Exterior Pocket For Mask and Snorkel Handy Front Accessory Loops Fits Up To 29" Fins Large enough to hold up to two sets of average to small sized snorkeling equipment, or one large adult set Handy front nylon loops hold defog, mask cleaner, suntan lotion and more
feature_bullets: Fits fins up to 28" in length

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
